game_description: Survive the cursed army of the Pharaoh that has laid a dark curse upon his dimension. Fight the enemies using a variety of weapons and find a way back to your portal to get home. Fight all enemies you see or use stealth. Experience a world never before seen in VR and start your journey today. This game will be uploaded with new content and levels periodically. Are you brave enough to battle the cursed undead?
review_1: so i got this game for free, to try out and finished it in about 20 mins atmosphere of this game is amazing, sand, and music does give you this sad and alone feeling, and art style help too, what this game need is a lot and a lot of polish, from control, more story, and similar stuff in general currently game plays like this, you have open room and you need to get to the end, and next room and next room , this did remind me of really old pc games, in a good way , this game just need more polish, maybe more story, and it set for greatness, i will update this game in a year to see how it progressed
review_2: This game kinda garbo, you walk slow af and die with like 2 hits.
review_3: Nice and different experience, really cool alien world. Sometimes really unforgiving combat!
